Human.Skill Bonuses: 1 extra skill rank at 1st level and every level thereafter

Dhampir.Defensive Traits: Undead Resistance, Resist Level Drain, Negative Energy Affinity

Kobold.Skill Bonuses: Crafty (+2 Craft trapmaking, Perception, Profession miner)

Ratfolk.Skill Bonuses: Tinker (+2 Craft alchemy, Perception, UMD), Rodent Empathy (+4 Handle Animal rodents)

Tengu.Skill Bonuses: Sneaky (+2 Perception, Stealth), Gifted Linguist (+4 Linguistics)

Grippli.Skill Bonuses: Camouflage (+4 Stealth in marshes/forests), Swamp Stride

Merfolk.Defensive Traits: Armor (+2 natural armor), Legless (cannot be tripped)

Nagaji.Defensive Traits: Armored Scales (+1 natural armor), Resistant (+2 vs mind-affecting/poison)
Nagaji.Skill Bonuses: Serpent's Sense (+2 Handle Animal reptiles, Perception)

Samsaran.Skill Bonuses: Shards of the Past (+2 to two skills)

Strix.Skill Bonuses: Nocturnal (+2 Perception, Stealth in dim light)

Svirfneblin.Defensive Traits: Defensive Training (+2 dodge to AC), Fortunate (+2 all saves), SR (11 + level)
Svirfneblin.Skill Bonuses: Skilled (+2 Stealth, Craft alchemy, Perception), Stonecunning

Vishkanya.Skill Bonuses: Keen Senses (+2 Perception), Limber (+2 Escape Artist, Stealth)

Astomoi.Defensive Traits: Mouthless (no eating/drinking), Sensitive Breath (-2 vs disease/poison)

Caligni.Defensive Traits: Death Throes (burst of light on death)

Deep One Hybrid.Offensive Traits: Take to the Water (+2 Init/Reflex while swimming)
Deep One Hybrid.Skill Bonuses: Sea Longing (Wisdom drain away from sea), Final Change

Ganzi.Defensive Traits: Maelstrom Resistance (Acid 5, Elec 5, Sonic 5), Polymorph Resistance (+2)

Kuru.Offensive Traits: Bite (1d6), Cannibalistic Vitality (temp hp from bite)

Naiad.Skill Bonuses: Fey Nature (+2 Handle Animal, Knowledge nature)

Orang-Pendak.Skill Bonuses: Forest Walker (+4 Climb, Stealth in forests), Simian Empathy (+4 Manage Animal monkeys/apes)

Reptoid.Defensive Traits: Scales (+1 natural armor), Cold-Blooded (+2 vs mind-affecting/poison)
Reptoid.Offensive Traits: Natural Weapons (Bite, 2 Claws), Mental Potency (+enchantment/illusion power)

Monkey Goblin.Skill Bonuses: +8 racial bonus on Climb checks, +4 racial bonus on Acrobatics and Stealth checks

Skinwalker.Offensive Traits: Change Shape (bestial features: bite, claws, senses, climb, or swim)
Skinwalker.Skill Bonuses: +2 racial bonus on Handle Animal and Spellcraft checks

Triaxian.Defensive Traits: Seasoned (immunity to cold or fire depending on season)

Android.Defensive Traits: Constructed (+4 vs mind-affecting, paralysis, poison, sleep, stun; immune to fatigue/exhaustion; don't breathe)
Android.Offensive Traits: Nanite Surge (bonus on one d20 roll/day)

Ghoran.Skill Bonuses: Past-Life Knowledge (all Knowledge as class skills)
Ghoran.Spell-Like (Sp) or Supernatural (Su) Abi: Natural Magic (Detect Poison, Goodberry, Purify Food and Drink 1/day), Seed (reincarnation)

Kasatha.Defensive Traits: Desert Stride (ignore difficult terrain in deserts), Stalker (+2 Perception/Stealth)
Kasatha.Offensive Traits: Multi-Armed (four arms), Jumper (always counts as having running start), Defensive Training (+2 dodge bonus to AC)
Kasatha.Skill Bonuses: +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics and Stealth checks

Lashunta.Ability Score Plus: Male: +2 Str, +2 Cha, -2 Wis / Female: +2 Int, +2 Cha, -2 Con
Lashunta.Skill Bonuses: +2 racial bonus on any one skill
Lashunta.Spell-Like (Sp) or Supernatural (Su) Abi: Lashunta Magic (Daze, Mage Hand, Psychogenic Trap at will; Detect Thoughts 1/day)

Shabti.Defensive Traits: Immortal (doesn't age), Immune to Undeath, Resist Level Drain
Shabti.Skill Bonuses: Past Life Knowledge (all Knowledge as class skills)

Trox.Offensive Traits: Frenzy (+2 Str/Con for 1 min), Grabbing appendages

Drow (Noble).Defensive Traits: Drow Immunities (Sleep, +2 vs enchantment), Spell Resistance (11 + level)
Drow (Noble).Spell-Like (Sp) or Supernatural (Su) Abi: At will—dancing lights, deeper darkness, faerie fire, feather fall, levitate; 1/day—divine favor, dispel magic, suggestion

Drider.Defensive Traits: Greater Spell Resistance (11 + level), Natural Armor (+2), Hard to Trip (+12 CMD vs trip)
